member.name: T:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertEventArgs
member.summary: Represents alert event arguments.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertEventArgs.#ctor(OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified alert message.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertEventArgs.Ignore
member.summary: Allows the handler to instruct the alert engine to ignore (not to persist) the alert.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertEventArgs.Message
member.summary: Gets the alert message.

member.name: T:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage
member.summary: Represents an alert message.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessageFlags)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified from, to, subject, body, and alert message flags.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.Body
member.summary: Gets or sets the alert body of the alert.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.CreatedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the user who created the alert.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets the status of the alert.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.From
member.summary: Gets or sets the "from" subject if it is a human based message of the alert.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the alert.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets the subject of the alert.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.TimeStamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the time of the alert.

member.name: P:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessage.To
member.summary: Gets or sets the recipient of the alert.

member.name: T:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessageFlags
member.summary: Represents a flag for an alert message.

member.name: F:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessageFlags.None
member.summary: Just a normal alert

member.name: F:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessageFlags.Alert
member.summary: Indicates the message requires some immediate action!

member.name: F:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessageFlags.Acknowledged
member.summary: Indicates whether someone has acknowledged the alert

member.name: F:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessageFlags.HighPriority
member.summary: Indicates the alert is high priority but doesn't require immediate action

member.name: F:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessageFlags.System
member.summary: Indicates the alert is a system alert

member.name: F:OpenIZ.Core.Alert.Alerting.AlertMessageFlags.Transient
member.summary: Indicates the alert is transient and shouldn't be persisted
